EndPoint Technologies' Roger Kay , calling that the smartphone market ''probably the fastest-moving market''- faster even than the video-game market-said the pair really have to move quite quickly. Neither Stephen Elop nor Steve Ballmer would estimate a time frame, though Steve Ballmer offered, ''Our belief is that we can move faster through this partnership than what we've ever done before.''
